parameters.name: date
parameters.description: String. ISO Date 8601. Must be URL encoded. Example: 2019-04-25T00:00:00.123123%2B07:00

get.summary: This endpoint will get all available items.
get.description:
You can use ?filter[field_name][operator] to filter the fields.
 You can sort the filter by using ?sort=field. Use - to make it descending. Example: ?sort=-due to sort due descending
